SELECT SUM(COALESCE(DEV_SUM.TOTAL_CPCT, 0)) AS TOTAL_CPCT, SUM(COALESCE(NOW_MON_SUM.MONTH_GENT_QNT, 0)) AS MONTH_GENT_QNT, SUM(COALESCE(AF_MON_SUM.MONTH_GENT_QNT, 0)) AS AF_MONTH_GENT_QNT, SUM(COALESCE(NOW_MON_SUM.MONTH_GENT_TIME, 0)) AS MONTH_GENT_TIME, SUM(COALESCE(NOW_MON_SUM.TOTAL_GENT_PROFT_AMT, 0)) AS TOTAL_GENT_PROFT_AMT, SUM(TRUNC(COALESCE((NOW_MON_SUM.MONTH_GENT_QNT - AF_MON_SUM.MONTH_GENT_QNT) / AF_MON_SUM.MONTH_GENT_QNT * 100, 0), 2)) AS MONTH_CHANGE_RATE FROM REMS.CUST_INF A
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SI.CUST_SEQ, SUM(COALESCE(GD.TDAY_GENT_QNT, 0)) AS MONTH_GENT_QNT, SUM(COALESCE(GD.TDAY_GENT_TIME, 0)) AS MONTH_GENT_TIME, SUM(COALESCE(GD.RDUC_AMT, 0)) AS TOTAL_GENT_PROFT_AMT FROM REMS.GENT_DAY_SUM GD INNER JOIN REMS.SITE_INF SI ON GD.SITE_SEQ = SI.SITE_SEQ WHERE to_char(to_date(GD.TGT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMM') GROUP BY SI.CUST_SEQ ) AS NOW_MON_SUM ON A.CUST_SEQ = NOW_MON_SUM.CUST_SEQ
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SI.CUST_SEQ, SUM(COALESCE(GD.TDAY_GENT_QNT, 0)) AS MONTH_GENT_QNT, SUM(COALESCE(GD.TDAY_GENT_TIME, 0)) AS MONTH_GENT_TIME, SUM(COALESCE(GD.RDUC_AMT, 0)) AS TOTAL_GENT_PROFT_AMT FROM REMS.GENT_DAY_SUM GD INNER JOIN REMS.SITE_INF SI ON GD.SITE_SEQ = SI.SITE_SEQ WHERE to_char(to_date(GD.TGT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMM') GROUP BY SI.CUST_SEQ ) AS AF_MON_SUM ON A.CUST_SEQ = AF_MON_SUM.CUST_SEQ
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SI.CUST_SEQ, SUM(COALESCE(DI.INSTL_CPCT, 0)) AS TOTAL_CPCT FROM REMS.DEV_INF DI INNER JOIN REMS.SITE_INF SI ON DI.SITE_SEQ = SI.SITE_SEQ WHERE DI.SVC_CD = 'PV_POW' GROUP BY SI.CUST_SEQ ) AS DEV_SUM ON A.CUST_SEQ = DEV_SUM.CUST_SEQ
AND A.CUST_SEQ = ${custSeq}
